src/include/scwrapper.h

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*! \file scwrapper.h
00002  *  This file contains C wrapper functions for system calls.
00003  *  The wrappers are used by user programs to perform system
00004  *  calls from C.
00005  */
00006 
00007 #ifndef _SCWRAPPER_H_
00008 #define _SCWRAPPER_H_
00009 
00010 /* Include the constants that identifies system calls. */
00011 #include "sysdefines.h"
00012 
00013 /*! Wrapper for the system call that returns the version of the kernel. */
00014 static inline unsigned long
00015 version(void)
00016 {
00017  unsigned long return_value;
00018  __asm volatile("syscall" :
00019                  "=a" (return_value) :
00020                  "a" (SYSCALL_VERSION) :
00021                  "cc", "%rcx", "%r11");
00022  return return_value;
00023 }
00024 
00025 /*! Wrapper for the system call that prints a string.
00026  * @param string Pointer to the string to be printed.
00027  * */
00028 static inline unsigned long
00029 prints(const char* const string)
00030 {
00031  unsigned long return_value;
00032  __asm volatile("syscall" :
00033                  "=a" (return_value) :
00034                  "a" (SYSCALL_PRINTS), "D" (string) :
00035                  "cc", "%rcx", "%r11");
00036  return return_value;
00037 }
00038 
00039 /*! Wrapper for the system call that prints a hexadecimal value.
00040  * @param value Hexadecimal value to be printed.
00041  */
00042 static inline unsigned long
00043 printhex(const unsigned long value)
00044 {
00045  unsigned long return_value;
00046  __asm volatile("syscall" :
00047                  "=a" (return_value) :
00048                  "a" (SYSCALL_PRINTHEX), "D" (value) :
00049                  "cc", "%rcx", "%r11");
00050  return return_value;
00051 }
00052 
00053 /*! Wrapper for the system call that invokes the bochs debugger */
00054 static inline unsigned long
00055 debugger(void)
00056 {
00057  unsigned long return_value;
00058  __asm volatile("syscall" :
00059                  "=a" (return_value) :
00060                  "a" (SYSCALL_DEBUGGER) :
00061                  "cc", "%rcx", "%r11");
00062  return return_value;
00063 }
00064 
00065 /*! Wrapper for the system call that terminates threads and processes. */
00066 static inline void
00067 terminate(void)
00068 {
00069  __asm volatile("syscall" :
00070                  :
00071                  "a" (SYSCALL_TERMINATE) :
00072                  "cc", "%rcx", "%r11");
00073 }
00074 
00075 /*! Wrapper for the system call that creates processes.
00076  * @param executable integer identifying the program which should be loaded 
00077  *  and run as a process.
00078  */
00079 static inline unsigned long
00080 createprocess(const int executable)
00081 {
00082  unsigned long return_value;
00083  __asm volatile("syscall" :
00084                  "=a" (return_value) :
00085                  "a" (SYSCALL_CREATEPROCESS), "D" (executable) :
00086                  "cc", "%r11", "%rcx");
00087  return return_value;
00088 }
00089 
00090 #endif
